prompt.description: The text description of the scene, subject, or action to generate in the video.

aspect_ratio.description: The aspect ratio of the generated video.

resolution.description: An enumeration where the short side of the video frame determines the resolution.

duration.description: The output video length in seconds. The 1080p quality option does not support 8-second videos.

negative_prompt.description: The description of elements to avoid in the generated video.

style.description: The style of the generated video.

seed.description: Varying the seed integer is a way to get different results for the same other request parameters. Using the same value for an identical request will produce similar results. If unspecified, a random number is chosen.

generate_audio_switch.description:
Enable audio generation.
- true: Audio on.
- false: Audio off.

generate_multi_clip_switch.description:
Enable multi-clip generation with dynamic camera changes.
- true: Multi-clip. 
- false: Single-clip.

thinking_type.description:
Prompt reasoning enhancement mode. 
- "enabled": Turn on prompt optimization. 
- "disabled": Turn off prompt optimization. 
- "auto" or omitted: Let the model decide automatically.

id.description: The ID of the generated video.

status.description: The current status of the generation task.

url.description: The URL where the file can be downloaded from.

error.description: Description of the error, if any.

credits_used.description: The number of tokens consumed during generation.

x-codeSamples.source:
curl -L \
  --request POST \
  --url 'https://api.aimlapi.com/v2/video/generations' \
  --header 'Authorization: Bearer <YOUR_AIMLAPI_KEY>' \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  --data '{
      "model": "pixverse/v5-5-text-to-video",
      "prompt": "A menacing evil dragon appears in a distance above the tallest mountain, then rushes toward the camera with its jaws open, revealing massive fangs. We see it’s coming."
    }'

POST /v2/video/generations HTTP/1.1
Host: api.aimlapi.com
Authorization: Bearer <YOUR_AIMLAPI_KEY>
Content-Type: application/json
Accept: */*

{
  "model": "pixverse/v5-5-text-to-video",
  "prompt": "A menacing evil dragon appears in a distance above the tallest mountain, then rushes toward the camera with its jaws open, revealing massive fangs. We see it’s coming."
}
